name: Elxis-CMS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Elxis is powerful open source content management system (CMS) released for free under the GNU/GPL license.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:Powered by <a href="http:\/\/www.elxis.org[\/]*" title="Elxis open source content management system"[\ target="_blank"]*>Elxis[\ CMS]*<\/a>)
(?-mix:<meta name="Generator" content="Elxis - Copyright \(C\) 2006-[0-9]{4} Elxis.org. All rights reserved." \/>)
